name: Monster
description:
This is a casual Sokoban game. Players need to use the keyboard to control the female character to complete the task and move to the next level.
Each map may have a variety of clearance strategies.

  • -Nudity or sexual content
  • -40 different levels
  • -40 unique H-animations
  • -Not suitable for watching at work
  • -Not suitable for all ages
  • -All characters in the game are over 18 years old
